Module contents

discrete1.

Top-level package for the discrete1 library.

This package exports a small convenience API for creating spatial/energy/ angular grids and accessing material definitions. Importing the package will expose commonly-used helpers so downstream code can do:

import discrete1

to have access to the main functionality.
